definition: a symbol that represents a value that can be changed
classification of a particular type of information. Is it text, integer, decimal???
a method or subroutine of the computer
the range or boundary of accepted values for the problem
the computer program performs different actions depending on whether the situation is true or false
the graphical representation of how to solve a problem
programming that is in computer code and part is in human language or slang
a mistake in the structure or sequence of characters in a program, makes the program crash
the period when the program is being executed
mistakes that cause the program to run incorrectly but not crash
the opposite of a variable. a value that never changes
a way of storing/organizing information for the computer to use it efficiently (think of file cabinet)
arrangement of items in an organized way such as a table/list: one type of a data structure
the step by step procedure to solving a problem
